tidbits.title: Youngest Nation
tidbits.description: South Sudan gained independence from Sudan in 2011, becoming the youngest nation in the world, but it has faced various challenges in its early years of statehood.

tidbits.title: Cultural Diversity
tidbits.description: The country is home to diverse ethnic groups, each with its unique languages, traditions, and customs, contributing to the rich tapestry of South Sudanese culture.

tidbits.title: Natural Resources
tidbits.description: South Sudan is endowed with natural resources, including oil reserves, yet struggles with socio-economic development and stability amid internal conflicts.
